page.title: 17Steam Engines,Fete & Gliding
page.content: { A vintage steam and stationary {working engines Rally}has been held at Roundton House for the past 7 years . Seventy working engines including four traction and steam engines have attracted over 120 adults and children every May Day holiday. The proceeds have been for the Church. { The International hang gliding {competitions}have been held on Llanfawr this year. This sport is frequently observed in the Corndon area ! { The Church Fete at Hyssington. There was Archery, Rifle Range, Tug of War competition, Cake stall, Plant stall, White elephant & Fancy goods, a tombola and an inflatable dragon to jump on ! The W.I. helped with teas. Â£435 was made for Church Funds.
